items.name: Welcome Essentials Kit
items.description: A practical, well-balanced selection of everyday office must-haves, ensuring new employees have everything they need to begin their journey confidently.

items.name: Welcome Prestige Kit
items.description: A sophisticated and elegant welcome kit crafted to deliver a top-tier corporate experience, perfect for making new hires feel valued and distinguished.

items.name: Welcome Smart Kit
items.description: A modern and functional kit featuring smart, productivity-boosting items designed to support efficient work and a smooth start to the workplace.

items.name: Welcome Echo Smart Kit
items.description: A thoughtfully curated smart kit featuring high-utility accessories like an Echo water bottle and eco-friendly jute bag, designed to deliver a premium and sustainable onboarding experience.

items.name: Welcome Echo Elite Kit
items.description: A thoughtfully curated smart kit featuring high-utility accessories like an Echo water bottle and eco-friendly jute bag, designed to deliver a premium and sustainable onboarding experience.

items.name: Welcome Elite Kit
items.description: A thoughtfully curated smart kit featuring high-utility accessories like an Echo water bottle and eco-friendly jute bag, designed to deliver a premium and sustainable onboarding experience.

items.name: Starter Edition
items.description: A simple and budget-friendly welcome kit with daily use essentials. Perfect for fresh joiners and interns.

items.name: Starter Plus Edition
items.description: A balanced kit combining utility and presentation for better onboarding experience. Great for mid-level welcome programs.

items.name: Starter Pro Edition
items.description: Premium onboarding bundle for a top-notch welcome experience. Ideal for professional teams and high-value employees.
